title: Contrôleur de Gestion Reporting Analyst
description:
ODDO BHF Tunis est une entreprise de services financiers en pleine croissance créée en 2008 afin d’accompagner le développement du Groupe Oddo BHF. 
Avec plus de 180 de collaborateurs, elle exerce aujourd’hui ses activités dans deux domaines principaux : l’analyse financière, et l’informatique. 
L’équipe de recherche actions contribue à la couverture de plus de 400 sociétés européennes cotées et au succès du bureau d’études Oddo Securities, qui bénéficie d’une forte notoriété internationale. 
L’équipe informatique assure le développement de tous les sites web et apporte son expertise aux projets informatiques majeurs du Groupe. 
Innovant sur le marché tunisien, ODDO BHF Tunis se développe rapidement et ambitionne de doubler ses effectifs d’ici 2020 dans le cadre du développement du Groupe en Allemagne.

Mission :
Au sein de la Direction Financière, l’équipe Controlling est composée de 6 collaborateurs dont 1 pôle de 2 personnes basé à Tunis et 1 responsable. En charge des missions traditionnelles du Contrôle de gestion, elle se place en Partner des business, des filiales et des fonctions supports du Groupe dont elle consolide l’ensemble des périmètres. Vos missions consisteront notamment à :

Au sein de ODDO BHF Tunis, vous rejoindrez le pôle Controlling composé de 6 collaborateurs réparties entre Paris et Tunis.

Dans ce contexte, vous aurez pour missions principales :

•	Participer à la production mensuelle des résultats du Groupe par métier.
•	Jouer un rôle de MOA sur les différents projets BI confiés à l’équipe Controlling ou initiés par elle (expression de besoins, travaux de recette, maintenance des reportings, etc.). 
•	Concevoir et mettre en œuvre de nouveaux reportings et outils d’aide au pilotage (revenus des activités, coûts, KPI’s, etc.).
•	Administration des outils partagés de l’équipe Controlling (gestion des accès, sécurité, interface avec les équipes DSI, etc.).
•	Contribuer au maintien d’une documentation à jour sur les process, les outils, les principaux référentiels utilisés pour les travaux récurrents de l’équipe 
Profil :
•	Bac +5 en informatique appliqué à la gestion
•	Junior et jusqu’à 3 ans d’expérience.
•	Compétences en gestion de projet.
•	Excellent niveau d’Anglais, la pratique de l’allemand constituerait un plus important.
•	Bonne communication écrite et orale.
•	Forte appétence pour la finance et les technologies de traitement de l’information. 
•	Autonomie et organisation.
•	Force de travail, engagement et excellent esprit d’équipe.
•	Fiabilité et rigueur (y compris gestion de la confidentialité), mais également curiosité, réflexion, initiative et force de proposition.
company/address: Cité les Pins- Immeuble Sandra Towers- Lac II

title: Senior ReactJS Developer
description:
Company:

WeaveLines is a digital lab building innovative software for U.S. startups and established businesses. We help our customers design, architect, develop and launch top digital platforms and software products.

Project abstract:

We are looking for an independent, self-reliant and fast learner React.JS Developer to join our team full-time and help in building cutting-edge digital products for our customers.  The position requires a full proficiency in React.JS and a strong experience with Electron and Laravel.

Project description:

•	Implement front-end in ReactJS
•	Package the front-end in an Electron desktop application.
•	Design and implement test scenarios (acceptance, security testing, etc.)
•	Develop product documentation (User and Developer manuals)
requirements/0: Must have ReactJS development experience.
requirements/1: Must have experience with consuming REST APIs.
requirements/2: Should be independent, self-reliant and a fast learner.
requirements/3: Should be comfortable and willing to work flexible hours.
requirements/4: Must be fluent in English (written and verbal).
requirements/5: Scrum and Agile methodology experience is a plus.

title: Développeur PHP/Symfony
description:
PROXYM Group,  leader dans le secteur IT notamment les solutions convergentes autour du Web, Mobile et Systèmes d’information. Fort par ses valeurs qui sont construites autour de l'indépendance, le goût du challenge, l'exigence, l’esprit d'équipe, la transparence et le sens de l'éthique.

Développeur  PHP/Symfony
Entité : PROXYM-IT

Niveau bac+4/5 ou expérience professionnelle équivalente en Marketing avec une bonne connaissance du webmarketing et de la culture du Marketing digital.

Excellent niveau de français à l'écrit.

Très bon niveau logiciel : Excel niveau avancé, Suite adobe, notions de montage vidéo, logiciels de motion design, serait un plus.

Une bonne base en SEO / SEA, réseaux sociaux, e-mailing...

Maîtrise des fonctionnalités de Google Analytics, Semrush... et des outils de référencement de Google (trends...).

Connaissance des CMS tels que Wordpress, Prestashop, Joomla...

 
Vos missions :

Analyse de données client, SEO, 

Bonne maîtrise d'Excel qui peut être utile lors de traitement de certaines bases de données clients, (tableaux croisés dynamiques /  recherche v) ...etc ou lors du reporting et analyse mensuelle des résultats SEO.

 

Rédaction de contenu web + newsletters
Animation et rédaction d'articles.

Animation et rédaction de contenu pour sites internet et pages de réseaux sociaux.

Rédaction et envoi de newsletters.


Montage vidéo + notions de motion design.

Création de vidéos motion design de promotion de l'entreprise et/ou de ses produits. 

 
SEO :

Audit SEO de l'actuel, et proposition d'optimisation par benchmark du référencement naturel de la concurrence et optimisation technique et sémantique des contenus des sites internet de l'entreprise.

Reporting mensuel des positions de l'entreprise sur Google et proposition de pistes d'amélioration.

title: Ingénieurs devops
description:
1.1.1 Job Description

 

As part of our growth in Tunis, we are looking to hire a DevOps Operator, who is passionate by UNIX and Oracle Administration and would like to have a career in an international company, in the Private Banking sector, within an exciting work environment.

You will be part of the Technical Team that spans in Geneva and Tunis which provide support across all Development Teams. You will integrate a critical role.

1.1.2 Responsibilities

•Providing daily server support during various operations such as deployment and general production delivery
•Collaborating with developers to make sure new environments meet requirements and conform to best practices
•Automating deployment of Unix applications, system configurations and security settings
•Managing and monitoring for Day-to-day operations service workloads
•Package software builds from the developers into one or multiple environment
•Continuous integration and delivery support
•Creating and maintains release workflow and tools
•Production support


1.1.3 Required Skills

•Proven work experience as DevOps Operator
•Strong experience in managing Unix based System infrastructure
•Nice to have an experience in managing Oracle based Database infrastructure 
•Good hands-on experience at least in one scripting language
•Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
•Good time-management skills
•Good command of the English language both written and oral
•Experience in working in an Agile development environment

title: Odoo & Python Developer
description:
Who we are :

We are a people centered company with the main goal to provide the perfect environment for talents to thrive within multidisciplinary teams (Java/JEE, Mobile, QA, DevOps, UX/Design) and agile processes (Scrum/Kanban). Always on the innovation frontier, we work on cutting-edge technologies and state-of-the-art architecture ranging from Java/JEE Fullstack development (JHipster, Spring Microservices, Angular) to the latest DevOps and test automations tools and technologies.

You will :

-Be part of a growing team of talented people responsible for developing products in the IoT domain based on cutting-edge technologies (Big Data, Microservices, Spring, Angular, ...).

- Work in an agile environment with skilled developers, DevOps and QA engineers and architects on developing world class products.


You are : 
-Passionate about technology and you enjoy working in a collaborative team where things move fast, and you can contribute your best work.
-You enjoy collaborating with others and have stellar project management abilities.

For you Python is not a snake, coding is what you do for a living, and you know that Odoo is a terrific open Source ERP System?     Apply now !
requirements/0: Proven experience of Odoo ERP & a strong Understanding of Odoo Framework / Technology Stack
requirements/1: Proven experience in Python development.
requirements/2: Strong communication skills, capable of describing complex technical issues
benefits: We love it when it feels like home. We start the day right with fresh breakfast, we play table ping pong, we create clubs and enjoy doing activities, and together we win football tournaments and go to the gym.

title: C/C++ Software Developer
description:
Nowadays, Self-driving or autonomous driving becomes the new trend among the pioneers in the automotive industry so do you think you have what it takes to join our family and become one of the world’s elite who works on this project?
We are looking for bright, dynamic and motivated Software Developers with strong personality and creative thinking!
Job Description:
Position Overview
This position involves software engineering & developing test cases with extensive work in designing and building high-quality, high-performance scenarios related to the environment especially on embedded platforms. You will work with a team of experienced developers and testers to research, design, develop, and test embedded software solutions for the new generation of autonomous driving cars.
The successful candidates will be eager and adept learners and open to the challenges of working with multiple teams in a global structure. 
Responsibilities
•	Develop test environments for the modules of the autonomous driving system in the car. 
•	Design and develop applications predominately in C/C++ on a Linux platform
•	Solve problems and create solutions for embedded systems and multi-threaded applications
•	Troubleshoot, isolate, and resolve issues in complex systems and components
•	Communicate effectively in English (written and verbally) with management, systems engineers, and other software developers on ideas and solutions 
•	Successfully complete multiple simultaneous tasks in an environment with rapidly changing priorities
•	Perform Deep dive analysis improving hardware, software interfaces in the autonomous driving.
•	Test and validate new software features and solutions on the test bench
requirements/0: Ability and willingness to read through code written by others, as well as the ability to create your own clean sheet designs
requirements/1: Strong Knowledge of Linux O/S environment, especially on embedded platforms
requirements/2: Hands-on experience developing, designing and testing real-time, multi-threaded and multi-process embedded applications on Linux
requirements/3: Highly proficient in C++ and associated object-oriented design
requirements/4: Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and computer science foundations, such as memory management, and low-level
requirements/5: Experience in all phases of the software development life-cycle
requirements/6: Experience with source control and bug tracking tools
requirements/7: The ability to proactively drive technical solutions in a collaborative environment
benefits:
Luncheon Vouchers Sodexo
Workshops abroad
Training and certifications
Annual trips
Perks
Family spirit
Medical Insurance
English Training
company/address: 14 th January Street El Ain Palace 9 th floor, Sfax Tunisia

title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
requirements/0: Good spoken and written English
requirements/1: Good knowledge of JavaScript, HTML(5) and CSS(3)
requirements/2: Excellent problem solving skills
requirements/3: You are familiar with different database concepts, e.g. MongoDB and Redis
requirements/4: You are not afraid of creating front-end interfaces using vanilla JavaScript or new frameworks like React, Angular, VueJS
requirements/5: You are an active communicator
requirements/8: Minimum of 2 years of professional experience
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district
- A fair package
- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun

description:
Who we are :

We are a people centered company with the main goal to provide the perfect environment for talents to thrive within multidisciplinary teams (Java/JEE, Mobile, QA, DevOps, UX/Design) and agile processes (Scrum/Kanban). Always on the innovation frontier, we work on cutting-edge technologies and state-of-the-art architecture ranging from Java/JEE Fullstack development (JHipster, Spring Microservices, Angular) to the latest DevOps and test automations tools and technologies.

You will :

-Be part of a growing team of talented people responsible for developing products in the IoT domain based on cutting-edge technologies (Big Data, Microservices, Spring, Angular, ...).

- Work in an agile environment with skilled developers, DevOps and QA engineers and architects on developing world class products.


You are : 
-Passionate about technology and you enjoy working in a collaborative team where things move fast, and you can contribute your best work.
-You enjoy collaborating with others and have stellar project management abilities.

For you Python is not a snake, coding is what you do for a living, and you know that Odoo is a terrific open Source ERP System?     Apply now !
requirements/0: Proven experience of Odoo ERP & a strong Understanding of Odoo Framework / Technology Stack
requirements/1: Proven experience in Python development.
requirements/2: Strong communication skills, capable of describing complex technical issues
benefits: We love it when it feels like home. We start the day right with fresh breakfast, we play table ping pong, we create clubs and enjoy doing activities, and together we win football tournaments and go to the gym.

title: Chef de projet Technique (H/F) DECADE Monastir
description:
Qui nous-sommes ? 

DECADE est un prestataire de services spécialisé dans l’e-commerce.
Fort de ses 30 années d'expérience, dont une douzaine dans la réalisation de sites e-commerce de référence, DECADE engage une nouvelle étape ambitieuse de son développement.
Celle-ci se traduit aujourd’hui par une offre de services originale en termes de fiabilisation et d'accompagnement des projets et vise une future offre innovante dans le monde du commerce en ligne.
requirements/0: Formation bac +4/5 Ingénieur
requirements/1: 3 ans d’expérience réussie dans les développements de sites web sous Java-J2ee, PHP ou .Net
requirements/2: Expérience significative en gestion de projet et gestion d’équipe de 2 à 10 personnes.
requirements/3: Connaissance des contraintes et problématiques des projets informatiques (gestion de sources, respect du planning, reporting ...)
requirements/4: Une bonne capacité à appréhender rapidement le côté fonctionnel et technique du projet
requirements/5: Une expérience en développement de site E-commerce est appréciée
benefits:
Ce que nous vous proposons :

-  Vous travaillerez sous la responsabilité d’un Business manager, dans le cadre d’un projet de service, au sein d’une structure de gouvernance établie par le Business Manager pour répondre de façon spécifique aux enjeux et aux objectifs du projet.

-  Vous veillez à la pertinence et la cohérence des solutions mises en œuvre par les équipes de DECADE dans le contexte spécifique du client.

-  Vous serez le/la responsable de la réalisation technique du projet pouvant mobiliser une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes.

-  Vous devrez maitriser la production d’une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes.

-  Vous animez l’équipe de réalisation et veillez, avec le business manager, à la bonne dynamique humaine de celle-ci et en relation avec l’ensemble de l’équipe projet.

-  Vous répondez de la qualité technique des réalisations et en particulier aux enjeux liés à un site e-commerce en ligne.

-  Vous organisez en concertation avec le business manager une capacité d’intervention pour répondre aux contraintes et enjeux en matière de disponibilité d’un site e-commerce en ligne.

-  Vous devrez être en mesure de traiter les urgences et les imprévus de « production » en s’appuyant sur l’ensemble des acteurs du projet concernés.

-  Vous faites appel, autant que besoin, aux différents supports et expertises techniques nécessaires.

-  Vous contribuez, avec le Business Manager, à l’évaluation des collaborateurs impliqués sur les projets dont vous aurez la responsabilité pour le compte de la direction des ressources de compétences et notamment du responsable du pôle technique.
company/address: Immeuble Le MONTPLAISIR  Avenue Kheireddine Pacha, Montplaisir  5ème étage porte B 51

title: C/C++ Software Developer
description:
Nowadays, Self-driving or autonomous driving becomes the new trend among the pioneers in the automotive industry so do you think you have what it takes to join our family and become one of the world’s elite who works on this project?
We are looking for bright, dynamic and motivated Software Developers with strong personality and creative thinking!
Job Description:
Position Overview
This position involves software engineering & developing test cases with extensive work in designing and building high-quality, high-performance scenarios related to the environment especially on embedded platforms. You will work with a team of experienced developers and testers to research, design, develop, and test embedded software solutions for the new generation of autonomous driving cars.
The successful candidates will be eager and adept learners and open to the challenges of working with multiple teams in a global structure. 
Responsibilities
•	Develop test environments for the modules of the autonomous driving system in the car. 
•	Design and develop applications predominately in C/C++ on a Linux platform
•	Solve problems and create solutions for embedded systems and multi-threaded applications
•	Troubleshoot, isolate, and resolve issues in complex systems and components
•	Communicate effectively in English (written and verbally) with management, systems engineers, and other software developers on ideas and solutions 
•	Successfully complete multiple simultaneous tasks in an environment with rapidly changing priorities
•	Perform Deep dive analysis improving hardware, software interfaces in the autonomous driving.
•	Test and validate new software features and solutions on the test bench
requirements/0: Ability and willingness to read through code written by others, as well as the ability to create your own clean sheet designs
requirements/1: Strong Knowledge of Linux O/S environment, especially on embedded platforms
requirements/2: Hands-on experience developing, designing and testing real-time, multi-threaded and multi-process embedded applications on Linux
requirements/3: Highly proficient in C++ and associated object-oriented design
requirements/4: Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and computer science foundations, such as memory management, and low-level
requirements/5: Experience in all phases of the software development life-cycle
requirements/6: Experience with source control and bug tracking tools
requirements/7: The ability to proactively drive technical solutions in a collaborative environment
benefits:
Luncheon Vouchers Sodexo
Workshops abroad
Training and certifications
Annual trips
Perks
Family spirit
Medical Insurance
English Training
company/address: 14 th January Street El Ain Palace 9 th floor, Sfax Tunisia

title: Contrôleur de Gestion Reporting Analyst
description:
ODDO BHF Tunis est une entreprise de services financiers en pleine croissance créée en 2008 afin d’accompagner le développement du Groupe Oddo BHF. 
Avec plus de 180 de collaborateurs, elle exerce aujourd’hui ses activités dans deux domaines principaux : l’analyse financière, et l’informatique. 
L’équipe de recherche actions contribue à la couverture de plus de 400 sociétés européennes cotées et au succès du bureau d’études Oddo Securities, qui bénéficie d’une forte notoriété internationale. 
L’équipe informatique assure le développement de tous les sites web et apporte son expertise aux projets informatiques majeurs du Groupe. 
Innovant sur le marché tunisien, ODDO BHF Tunis se développe rapidement et ambitionne de doubler ses effectifs d’ici 2020 dans le cadre du développement du Groupe en Allemagne.

Mission :
Au sein de la Direction Financière, l’équipe Controlling est composée de 6 collaborateurs dont 1 pôle de 2 personnes basé à Tunis et 1 responsable. En charge des missions traditionnelles du Contrôle de gestion, elle se place en Partner des business, des filiales et des fonctions supports du Groupe dont elle consolide l’ensemble des périmètres. Vos missions consisteront notamment à :

Au sein de ODDO BHF Tunis, vous rejoindrez le pôle Controlling composé de 6 collaborateurs réparties entre Paris et Tunis.

Dans ce contexte, vous aurez pour missions principales :

•	Participer à la production mensuelle des résultats du Groupe par métier.
•	Jouer un rôle de MOA sur les différents projets BI confiés à l’équipe Controlling ou initiés par elle (expression de besoins, travaux de recette, maintenance des reportings, etc.). 
•	Concevoir et mettre en œuvre de nouveaux reportings et outils d’aide au pilotage (revenus des activités, coûts, KPI’s, etc.).
•	Administration des outils partagés de l’équipe Controlling (gestion des accès, sécurité, interface avec les équipes DSI, etc.).
•	Contribuer au maintien d’une documentation à jour sur les process, les outils, les principaux référentiels utilisés pour les travaux récurrents de l’équipe 
Profil :
•	Bac +5 en informatique appliqué à la gestion
•	Junior et jusqu’à 3 ans d’expérience.
•	Compétences en gestion de projet.
•	Excellent niveau d’Anglais, la pratique de l’allemand constituerait un plus important.
•	Bonne communication écrite et orale.
•	Forte appétence pour la finance et les technologies de traitement de l’information. 
•	Autonomie et organisation.
•	Force de travail, engagement et excellent esprit d’équipe.
•	Fiabilité et rigueur (y compris gestion de la confidentialité), mais également curiosité, réflexion, initiative et force de proposition.
company/address: Cité les Pins- Immeuble Sandra Towers- Lac II

title: Ingénieurs devops
description:
1.1.1 Job Description

 

As part of our growth in Tunis, we are looking to hire a DevOps Operator, who is passionate by UNIX and Oracle Administration and would like to have a career in an international company, in the Private Banking sector, within an exciting work environment.

You will be part of the Technical Team that spans in Geneva and Tunis which provide support across all Development Teams. You will integrate a critical role.

1.1.2 Responsibilities

•Providing daily server support during various operations such as deployment and general production delivery
•Collaborating with developers to make sure new environments meet requirements and conform to best practices
•Automating deployment of Unix applications, system configurations and security settings
•Managing and monitoring for Day-to-day operations service workloads
•Package software builds from the developers into one or multiple environment
•Continuous integration and delivery support
•Creating and maintains release workflow and tools
•Production support


1.1.3 Required Skills

•Proven work experience as DevOps Operator
•Strong experience in managing Unix based System infrastructure
•Nice to have an experience in managing Oracle based Database infrastructure 
•Good hands-on experience at least in one scripting language
•Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
•Good time-management skills
•Good command of the English language both written and oral
•Experience in working in an Agile development environment

description:
We are looking for a junior .Net developer.

Profile:
    1) Software engineer degree or equivalent

title: Odoo & Python Developer
description:
Who we are :

We are a people centered company with the main goal to provide the perfect environment for talents to thrive within multidisciplinary teams (Java/JEE, Mobile, QA, DevOps, UX/Design) and agile processes (Scrum/Kanban). Always on the innovation frontier, we work on cutting-edge technologies and state-of-the-art architecture ranging from Java/JEE Fullstack development (JHipster, Spring Microservices, Angular) to the latest DevOps and test automations tools and technologies.

You will :

-Be part of a growing team of talented people responsible for developing products in the IoT domain based on cutting-edge technologies (Big Data, Microservices, Spring, Angular, ...).

- Work in an agile environment with skilled developers, DevOps and QA engineers and architects on developing world class products.


You are : 
-Passionate about technology and you enjoy working in a collaborative team where things move fast, and you can contribute your best work.
-You enjoy collaborating with others and have stellar project management abilities.

For you Python is not a snake, coding is what you do for a living, and you know that Odoo is a terrific open Source ERP System?     Apply now !
requirements/0: Proven experience of Odoo ERP & a strong Understanding of Odoo Framework / Technology Stack
requirements/1: Proven experience in Python development.
requirements/2: Strong communication skills, capable of describing complex technical issues
benefits: We love it when it feels like home. We start the day right with fresh breakfast, we play table ping pong, we create clubs and enjoy doing activities, and together we win football tournaments and go to the gym.

title: Contrôleur de Gestion Reporting Analyst
description:
ODDO BHF Tunis est une entreprise de services financiers en pleine croissance créée en 2008 afin d’accompagner le développement du Groupe Oddo BHF. 
Avec plus de 180 de collaborateurs, elle exerce aujourd’hui ses activités dans deux domaines principaux : l’analyse financière, et l’informatique. 
L’équipe de recherche actions contribue à la couverture de plus de 400 sociétés européennes cotées et au succès du bureau d’études Oddo Securities, qui bénéficie d’une forte notoriété internationale. 
L’équipe informatique assure le développement de tous les sites web et apporte son expertise aux projets informatiques majeurs du Groupe. 
Innovant sur le marché tunisien, ODDO BHF Tunis se développe rapidement et ambitionne de doubler ses effectifs d’ici 2020 dans le cadre du développement du Groupe en Allemagne.

Mission :
Au sein de la Direction Financière, l’équipe Controlling est composée de 6 collaborateurs dont 1 pôle de 2 personnes basé à Tunis et 1 responsable. En charge des missions traditionnelles du Contrôle de gestion, elle se place en Partner des business, des filiales et des fonctions supports du Groupe dont elle consolide l’ensemble des périmètres. Vos missions consisteront notamment à :

Au sein de ODDO BHF Tunis, vous rejoindrez le pôle Controlling composé de 6 collaborateurs réparties entre Paris et Tunis.

Dans ce contexte, vous aurez pour missions principales :

•	Participer à la production mensuelle des résultats du Groupe par métier.
•	Jouer un rôle de MOA sur les différents projets BI confiés à l’équipe Controlling ou initiés par elle (expression de besoins, travaux de recette, maintenance des reportings, etc.). 
•	Concevoir et mettre en œuvre de nouveaux reportings et outils d’aide au pilotage (revenus des activités, coûts, KPI’s, etc.).
•	Administration des outils partagés de l’équipe Controlling (gestion des accès, sécurité, interface avec les équipes DSI, etc.).
•	Contribuer au maintien d’une documentation à jour sur les process, les outils, les principaux référentiels utilisés pour les travaux récurrents de l’équipe 
Profil :
•	Bac +5 en informatique appliqué à la gestion
•	Junior et jusqu’à 3 ans d’expérience.
•	Compétences en gestion de projet.
•	Excellent niveau d’Anglais, la pratique de l’allemand constituerait un plus important.
•	Bonne communication écrite et orale.
•	Forte appétence pour la finance et les technologies de traitement de l’information. 
•	Autonomie et organisation.
•	Force de travail, engagement et excellent esprit d’équipe.
•	Fiabilité et rigueur (y compris gestion de la confidentialité), mais également curiosité, réflexion, initiative et force de proposition.
company/address: Cité les Pins- Immeuble Sandra Towers- Lac II

title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
requirements/0: Good spoken and written English
requirements/1: Good knowledge of JavaScript, HTML(5) and CSS(3)
requirements/2: Excellent problem solving skills
requirements/3: You are familiar with different database concepts, e.g. MongoDB and Redis
requirements/4: You are not afraid of creating front-end interfaces using vanilla JavaScript or new frameworks like React, Angular, VueJS
requirements/5: You are an active communicator
requirements/8: Minimum of 2 years of professional experience
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district
- A fair package
- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun

title: Chef de projet Technique (H/F) DECADE Monastir
description:
Qui nous-sommes ? 

DECADE est un prestataire de services spécialisé dans l’e-commerce.
Fort de ses 30 années d'expérience, dont une douzaine dans la réalisation de sites e-commerce de référence, DECADE engage une nouvelle étape ambitieuse de son développement.
Celle-ci se traduit aujourd’hui par une offre de services originale en termes de fiabilisation et d'accompagnement des projets et vise une future offre innovante dans le monde du commerce en ligne.
requirements/0: Formation bac +4/5 Ingénieur
requirements/1: 3 ans d’expérience réussie dans les développements de sites web sous Java-J2ee, PHP ou .Net
requirements/2: Expérience significative en gestion de projet et gestion d’équipe de 2 à 10 personnes.
requirements/3: Connaissance des contraintes et problématiques des projets informatiques (gestion de sources, respect du planning, reporting ...)
requirements/4: Une bonne capacité à appréhender rapidement le côté fonctionnel et technique du projet
requirements/5: Une expérience en développement de site E-commerce est appréciée
benefits:
Ce que nous vous proposons :

-  Vous travaillerez sous la responsabilité d’un Business manager, dans le cadre d’un projet de service, au sein d’une structure de gouvernance établie par le Business Manager pour répondre de façon spécifique aux enjeux et aux objectifs du projet.

-  Vous veillez à la pertinence et la cohérence des solutions mises en œuvre par les équipes de DECADE dans le contexte spécifique du client.

-  Vous serez le/la responsable de la réalisation technique du projet pouvant mobiliser une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes.

-  Vous devrez maitriser la production d’une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes.

-  Vous animez l’équipe de réalisation et veillez, avec le business manager, à la bonne dynamique humaine de celle-ci et en relation avec l’ensemble de l’équipe projet.

-  Vous répondez de la qualité technique des réalisations et en particulier aux enjeux liés à un site e-commerce en ligne.

-  Vous organisez en concertation avec le business manager une capacité d’intervention pour répondre aux contraintes et enjeux en matière de disponibilité d’un site e-commerce en ligne.

-  Vous devrez être en mesure de traiter les urgences et les imprévus de « production » en s’appuyant sur l’ensemble des acteurs du projet concernés.

-  Vous faites appel, autant que besoin, aux différents supports et expertises techniques nécessaires.

-  Vous contribuez, avec le Business Manager, à l’évaluation des collaborateurs impliqués sur les projets dont vous aurez la responsabilité pour le compte de la direction des ressources de compétences et notamment du responsable du pôle technique.

title: C/C++ Software Developer
description:
Nowadays, Self-driving or autonomous driving becomes the new trend among the pioneers in the automotive industry so do you think you have what it takes to join our family and become one of the world’s elite who works on this project?
We are looking for bright, dynamic and motivated Software Developers with strong personality and creative thinking!
Job Description:
Position Overview
This position involves software engineering & developing test cases with extensive work in designing and building high-quality, high-performance scenarios related to the environment especially on embedded platforms. You will work with a team of experienced developers and testers to research, design, develop, and test embedded software solutions for the new generation of autonomous driving cars.
The successful candidates will be eager and adept learners and open to the challenges of working with multiple teams in a global structure. 
Responsibilities
•	Develop test environments for the modules of the autonomous driving system in the car. 
•	Design and develop applications predominately in C/C++ on a Linux platform
•	Solve problems and create solutions for embedded systems and multi-threaded applications
•	Troubleshoot, isolate, and resolve issues in complex systems and components
•	Communicate effectively in English (written and verbally) with management, systems engineers, and other software developers on ideas and solutions 
•	Successfully complete multiple simultaneous tasks in an environment with rapidly changing priorities
•	Perform Deep dive analysis improving hardware, software interfaces in the autonomous driving.
•	Test and validate new software features and solutions on the test bench
requirements/0: Ability and willingness to read through code written by others, as well as the ability to create your own clean sheet designs
requirements/1: Strong Knowledge of Linux O/S environment, especially on embedded platforms
requirements/2: Hands-on experience developing, designing and testing real-time, multi-threaded and multi-process embedded applications on Linux
requirements/3: Highly proficient in C++ and associated object-oriented design
requirements/4: Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and computer science foundations, such as memory management, and low-level
requirements/5: Experience in all phases of the software development life-cycle
requirements/6: Experience with source control and bug tracking tools
requirements/7: The ability to proactively drive technical solutions in a collaborative environment
benefits:
Luncheon Vouchers Sodexo
Workshops abroad
Training and certifications
Annual trips
Perks
Family spirit
Medical Insurance
English Training

description:

We are a people centered company with the main goal to provide the perfect environment for talents to thrive within multidisciplinary teams (Java/JEE, Mobile, QA, DevOps, UX/Design) and agile processes (Scrum/Kanban). title: Team Lead .BI
description:
ODDO BHF Tunis est une entreprise de services financiers en pleine croissance créée en 2008 afin d’accompagner le développement du Groupe Oddo BHF. 
Avec plus de 180 de collaborateurs, elle exerce aujourd’hui ses activités dans deux domaines principaux : l’analyse financière, et l’informatique. 
L’équipe de recherche actions contribue à la couverture de plus de 400 sociétés européennes cotées et au succès du bureau d’études Oddo Securities, qui bénéficie d’une forte notoriété internationale. 
L’équipe informatique assure le développement de tous les sites web et apporte son expertise aux projets informatiques majeurs du Groupe. 
Innovant sur le marché tunisien, ODDO BHF Tunis se développe rapidement et ambitionne de doubler ses effectifs d’ici 2020 dans le cadre du développement du Groupe en Allemagne.

Mission :
Au sein de ODDO BHF Tunis, vous rejoindrez le pôle de REPORTING BI composé de 30 collaborateurs réparties entre Paris et Tunis.

Dans ce contexte, vous aurez pour missions principales :

•	La participation dans la modélisation et le développement des solutions de reporting 
•	La participation à la modélisation et la conception des architectures data, des bases de données et les modèles des données 
•	La modélisation et l’implémentation des modèles des données et frameworks via IBM Cognos Framework Manager
•	La modélisation de cubes à partir de l’outil IBM Cognos Transformer et IBM TM1 Architect
•	Le développement des rapports et dashboards dynamiques sur IBM Cognos Analytics et IBM Cognos Report Studio
•	Assurer le respect de bonnes pratiques BI au sein de l’équipe (modélisation, requêtes SQL, reporting)
•	Assurer le suivi des projets et l’animation des réunions d’équipe
•	Garantir et assurer le respect de la qualité de développement et échéances projets
•	Assurer le support technique et fonctionnel aux utilisateurs sur les outils de reporting
•	Communiquer avec le métier pour préciser ses attentes
•	Reporter au management sur l’avancement des chantiers

Profil :
•	Diplôme d’ingénieur ou équivalent (bac + 5) avec min 5 ans d’expérience en développement BI et min 2 ans en tant que Team Lead
•	Vous maîtrisez parfaitement les concepts de base de l’informatique décisionnelle (modélisation, alimentation, restitution…) et des bases de données relationnelles. 
•	Vous maîtrisez parfaitement les outils de BI (IBM Cognos Analytics).
•	Vous maîtrisez SQL et la réalisation des flux de données via un ETL.
•	Autonomie, organisation, rigueur, proactivité et très bon sens de leadership
•	Sens relationnel, esprit d’équipe et bonne capacité de gestion du stress
•	Excellent niveau de français et bon niveau d’anglais, l’allemand serait un plus
•	Serait un plus la connaissance du fonctionnel de la banque/finance

title: Développeurs Web  PHP (H/F) DECADE Tunis
description:
Qui nous-sommes ? 

DECADE est un prestataire de services spécialisé dans l’e-commerce.
Fort de ses 30 années d'expérience, dont une douzaine dans la réalisation de sites e-commerce de référence, DECADE engage une nouvelle étape ambitieuse de son développement.
Celle-ci se traduit aujourd’hui par une offre de services originale en termes de fiabilisation et d'accompagnement des projets et vise une future offre innovante dans le monde du commerce en ligne.
benefits:
Ce que nous vous proposons :

- Contribuer à la mise en œuvre et à la fiabilisation des projets e-commerce de grands acteurs de la distribution en France.
- Participer à des projets d’intégration de plateformes leaders du marché (SAP Hybris, Mirakl, Magento, …), enrichir et faire évoluer ces intégrations pour accompagner les expérimentations e-commerce de nos clients.
- Bénéficier d’un encadrement expérimenté qui vous permettra de progresser.
- Intervenir dans des contextes stratégiques pour nos clients, engagés dans des transformations e-commerce, pour vivre des challenges variés.
- Développer vos compétences techniques, fonctionnelles, projets, … afin de vous ouvrir à de multiples voies d’évolution et d’orientation de votre carrière.
- Participer à un projet d'entreprise innovant et ambitieux.

title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district
- A fair package
- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun

title: SOFTWARE TEST AUTOMATION
description:
As part of our growth in Tunis, we are looking to hire a Software Test Automation to reinforce our QA Team, and would like to build a career in an international company, with an expertise in delivering advanced software solutions tailored to the Private Banking domain and Wealth Management industries.
The candidate will integrate a multi-site, cross-functional QA team, with highly motivated people, and will be responsible for designing and implementing automatic tests on Banking products, using different technologies and test tools.
The required candidate should have good testing knowledge, and a fluency on scripting and automating Desktop applications, Web applications as well as Web services.

title: Développeur informatique
description:

title: Développeur Mobile Android junior - TUN
description:
Vous êtes passionné des technologies mobiles ? Vous voulez continuer à progresser dans un environnement excitant, jeune et dynamique ? Mobelite cherche un Développeur Mobile Android pour soutenir sa croissance. 
Mobelite est une agence spécialisée dans le conseil en stratégie mobile, la conception et le développement d’applications mobiles et de sites web et le marketing mobile. Mobelite est forte d’une équipe d’experts dans la réalisation d’applications mobiles sur les plateformes les plus répandues et les applications Web. Mobelite dispose d’équipes commerciales et marketing à Paris (France), et d’équipes de développement à Tunis et Monastir (Tunisie). 

Profil recherché : 
De formation Bac +5, avec 02 ans d'expérience, vous êtes autonome, curieux et débrouillard. 

Description du poste :

Vous serez chargé de : 
- L’analyse des besoins 
- Le choix de la solution technique 
- Le développement de toutes les fonctionnalités techniques de l’application Mobile 
- Le respect des bonnes pratiques de codage 
- Les tests et la validation des fonctionnalités développées

title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district
- A fair package
- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun

title: Team Lead .BI
description:
ODDO BHF Tunis est une entreprise de services financiers en pleine croissance créée en 2008 afin d’accompagner le développement du Groupe Oddo BHF. 
Avec plus de 180 de collaborateurs, elle exerce aujourd’hui ses activités dans deux domaines principaux : l’analyse financière, et l’informatique. 
L’équipe de recherche actions contribue à la couverture de plus de 400 sociétés européennes cotées et au succès du bureau d’études Oddo Securities, qui bénéficie d’une forte notoriété internationale. 
L’équipe informatique assure le développement de tous les sites web et apporte son expertise aux projets informatiques majeurs du Groupe. 
Innovant sur le marché tunisien, ODDO BHF Tunis se développe rapidement et ambitionne de doubler ses effectifs d’ici 2020 dans le cadre du développement du Groupe en Allemagne.

Mission :
Au sein de ODDO BHF Tunis, vous rejoindrez le pôle de REPORTING BI composé de 30 collaborateurs réparties entre Paris et Tunis.

Dans ce contexte, vous aurez pour missions principales :

•	La participation dans la modélisation et le développement des solutions de reporting 
•	La participation à la modélisation et la conception des architectures data, des bases de données et les modèles des données 
•	La modélisation et l’implémentation des modèles des données et frameworks via IBM Cognos Framework Manager
•	La modélisation de cubes à partir de l’outil IBM Cognos Transformer et IBM TM1 Architect
•	Le développement des rapports et dashboards dynamiques sur IBM Cognos Analytics et IBM Cognos Report Studio
•	Assurer le respect de bonnes pratiques BI au sein de l’équipe (modélisation, requêtes SQL, reporting)
•	Assurer le suivi des projets et l’animation des réunions d’équipe
•	Garantir et assurer le respect de la qualité de développement et échéances projets
•	Assurer le support technique et fonctionnel aux utilisateurs sur les outils de reporting
•	Communiquer avec le métier pour préciser ses attentes
•	Reporter au management sur l’avancement des chantiers

Profil :
•	Diplôme d’ingénieur ou équivalent (bac + 5) avec min 5 ans d’expérience en développement BI et min 2 ans en tant que Team Lead
•	Vous maîtrisez parfaitement les concepts de base de l’informatique décisionnelle (modélisation, alimentation, restitution…) et des bases de données relationnelles. 
•	Vous maîtrisez parfaitement les outils de BI (IBM Cognos Analytics).
•	Vous maîtrisez SQL et la réalisation des flux de données via un ETL.
•	Autonomie, organisation, rigueur, proactivité et très bon sens de leadership
•	Sens relationnel, esprit d’équipe et bonne capacité de gestion du stress
•	Excellent niveau de français et bon niveau d’anglais, l’allemand serait un plus
•	Serait un plus la connaissance du fonctionnel de la banque/finance

Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district
- A fair package
- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun

title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district

- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project

title: Administrateur Système et Réseaux
description:
PROXYM Group, leader dans le secteur IT notamment les solutions convergentes autour du Web, Mobile et Systèmes d’information. Fort par ses valeurs qui sont construites autour de l'indépendance, le goût du challenge, l'exigence, l’esprit d'équipe, la transparence et le sens de l'éthique.

Administrateur Système et Réseaux

description:

We are a people centered company with the main goal to provide the perfect environment for talents to thrive within multidisciplinary teams (Java/JEE, Mobile, QA, DevOps, UX/Design) and agile processes (Scrum/Kanban). title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
benefits:

-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district

- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun

title: C/C++ Software Developer
description:
Nowadays, Self-driving or autonomous driving becomes the new trend among the pioneers in the automotive industry so do you think you have what it takes to join our family and become one of the world’s elite who works on this project?
We are looking for bright, dynamic and motivated Software Developers with strong personality and creative thinking!
Job Description:
Position Overview
This position involves software engineering & developing test cases with extensive work in designing and building high-quality, high-performance scenarios related to the environment especially on embedded platforms. You will work with a team of experienced developers and testers to research, design, develop, and test embedded software solutions for the new generation of autonomous driving cars.
The successful candidates will be eager and adept learners and open to the challenges of working with multiple teams in a global structure. 
Responsibilities
•	Develop test environments for the modules of the autonomous driving system in the car. 
•	Design and develop applications predominately in C/C++ on a Linux platform
•	Solve problems and create solutions for embedded systems and multi-threaded applications
•	Troubleshoot, isolate, and resolve issues in complex systems and components
•	Communicate effectively in English (written and verbally) with management, systems engineers, and other software developers on ideas and solutions 
•	Successfully complete multiple simultaneous tasks in an environment with rapidly changing priorities
•	Perform Deep dive analysis improving hardware, software interfaces in the autonomous driving.
•	Test and validate new software features and solutions on the test bench
benefits:
Luncheon Vouchers Sodexo
Workshops abroad
Training and certifications
Annual trips
Perks
Family spirit
Medical Insurance
English Training

title: Chef de projet Technique (H/F) - DECADE SFAX
description:
Qui nous-sommes ?

DECADE est un prestataire de services spécialisé dans l’e-commerce.

Fort de ses 30 années d'expérience, dont une douzaine dans la réalisation de sites e-commerce de référence, DECADE engage une nouvelle étape ambitieuse de son développement.

Celle-ci se traduit aujourd’hui par une offre de services originale en termes de fiabilisation et d'accompagnement des projets et vise une future offre innovante dans le monde du commerce en ligne.

 A Monastir depuis 1998, puis à Tunis en 2015, DECADE Tunisie ouvre très prochainement des locaux à SFAX afin d’accompagner son développement.
benefits:
Ce que nous vous proposons :

- Vous travaillerez sous la responsabilité d’un Business manager, dans le cadre d’un projet de service, au sein d’une structure de gouvernance établie par le Business Manager pour répondre de façon spécifique aux enjeux et aux objectifs du projet.

-Vous veillez à la pertinence et la cohérence des solutions mises en œuvre par les équipes de DECADE dans le contexte spécifique du client.
 
-Vous serez le/la responsable de la réalisation technique du projet pouvant mobiliser une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes. 
Vous devrez maîtriser la production d’une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes.

-Vous animez l’équipe de réalisation et veillez, avec le business manager, à la bonne dynamique humaine de celle-ci et en relation avec l’ensemble de l’équipe projet. 

-Vous répondez de la qualité technique des réalisations et en particulier aux enjeux liés à un site e-commerce en ligne.
Vous organisez en concertation avec le business manager une capacité d’intervention pour répondre aux contraintes et enjeux en matière de disponibilité d’un site e-commerce en ligne.

-Vous devrez être en mesure de traiter les urgences et les imprévus de « production » en s’appuyant sur l’ensemble des acteurs du projet concernés.

-Vous faites appel, autant que besoin, aux différents supports et expertises techniques nécessaires

-Vous contribuez, avec le Business Manager, à l’évaluation des collaborateurs impliqués sur les projets dont vous aurez la responsabilité pour le compte de la direction des ressources de compétences et notamment du responsable du pôle technique.

-Vous répondez de la qualité technique des réalisations et en particulier aux enjeux liés à un site e-commerce en ligne.
Vous organisez en concertation avec le business manager une capacité d’intervention pour répondre aux contraintes et enjeux en matière de disponibilité d’un site e-commerce en ligne.

-Vous devrez être en mesure de traiter les urgences et les imprévus de « production » en s’appuyant sur l’ensemble des acteurs du projet concernés.

-Vous faites appel, autant que besoin, aux différents supports et expertises techniques nécessaires

-Vous contribuez, avec le Business Manager, à l’évaluation des collaborateurs impliqués sur les projets dont vous aurez la responsabilité pour le compte de la direction des ressources de compétences et notamment du responsable du pôle technique.

title: Experienced JavaScript developer
description:
Experienced JavaScript developer

xTECH is a web and mobile development company which works with corporations from all over the world and especially the ones based in Europe. We offer them the opportunity to focus on their business while we excel in our tasks, to provide exceptional software development. 

Description:
We are looking for bright code typewriter and brighter minds to help us deliver a cutting-edge, high-quality code. 
You are keen on responsive user-interfaces and dynamic websites and working hard with a team in order to implement as many ideas as possible. You’re not afraid of new technologies and you enjoy analyzing the frameworks and libraries you use in order to understand how things work. 

Overall you are an open, flexible problem solver and critical thinker who is passionate about working in a close-knit team. 
If you fit the profile! Then you are in the right place. 

Your responsibilities will be: 
Implement JavaScript client applications with the help of the newest web-standards (HTML5, CSS3, React ...). 
Extent and improve existing apps in fast iterations, based on user feedback and usage data. 
Build new and iterate over existing backend services in NodeJS. 
Implement unit tests. 
Store and retrieve data from sources like Redis, MongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra. 
Work in a hyperproductive team of developers. 
Coordinate your efforts with the company employing SCRUM techniques. 
Quickly become a decision and a difference maker.
Contribute to and even start open-source projects.


Our hiring process:

First Step: resume review
Our application questions and job descriptions are designed to help us identify individuals who have the qualifications that best fit our job postings. Typically, we contact the most qualified candidates for an interview within 2 to 4 weeks (however, some hiring programs may have a longer time frame). If you are selected for an interview, we may contact you to provide more information. Be sure to check your inbox to ensure that emails from xTECH are not being sent to your spam/junk folder.

Assessments: the coding test
For developers positions, a preliminary assessment is required. This will include a code test. Once you apply, you will receive an email from us  with the code test. After receiving your solutions to the tests, we will review them and then contact you to give you the results. If you have been successful, we will invite you to do an interview in our offices.

Interview format
The interview will allow you to meet our recruiting team and learn more about our company as we get to know you better. Our recruiting team will contact you (either by email or by phone) to communicate the specifics of your interview. The details will include the location and timing of the interview. You’ll know what to expect in advance. 

We encourage you to ask questions during your interview to learn more about xTECH careers as we learn more about you and your qualifications.
benefits:
- A great team
-A nice office in a Tunis’s booming district
- A fair package
- We guarantee an inspiring environment, creative freedom and the chance to contribute your own ideas in order to co-create our project
- Exposure to startups and scaling success stories
- Being part of a small yet international team
- Get time to deepen knowledge in the latest web technologies
- Super fun
company: {'id': 21522, 'name': 'xTECH', 'logo': 'https://img.jobi.tn/dfebdc11-d067-995f-0856-7fc5e7c93561/version/resize/300x300/', 'address': '1 Rue El Ghazali, Marsa ', 'uuid': '1a0d5ae3-af2b-4020-b655-91ffc6a04af4', 'slug': 'xtech-21522'}
requirements: ['Good spoken and written English', 'Good knowledge of JavaScript, HTML(5) and CSS(3)', 'Excellent problem solving skills', 'You are familiar with different database concepts, e.g. MongoDB and Redis', 'You are not afraid of creating front-end interfaces using vanilla JavaScript or new frameworks like React, Angular, VueJS', 'You are an active communicator', 'You are a superfast learner', 'You are familiar with git', 'Minimum of 2 years of professional experience']

title: Chef de projet Technique (H/F) - DECADE SFAX
description:
Qui nous-sommes ?

DECADE est un prestataire de services spécialisé dans l’e-commerce.

Fort de ses 30 années d'expérience, dont une douzaine dans la réalisation de sites e-commerce de référence, DECADE engage une nouvelle étape ambitieuse de son développement.

Celle-ci se traduit aujourd’hui par une offre de services originale en termes de fiabilisation et d'accompagnement des projets et vise une future offre innovante dans le monde du commerce en ligne.

 A Monastir depuis 1998, puis à Tunis en 2015, DECADE Tunisie ouvre très prochainement des locaux à SFAX afin d’accompagner son développement.
benefits:
Ce que nous vous proposons :

- Vous travaillerez sous la responsabilité d’un Business manager, dans le cadre d’un projet de service, au sein d’une structure de gouvernance établie par le Business Manager pour répondre de façon spécifique aux enjeux et aux objectifs du projet.

-Vous veillez à la pertinence et la cohérence des solutions mises en œuvre par les équipes de DECADE dans le contexte spécifique du client.
 
-Vous serez le/la responsable de la réalisation technique du projet pouvant mobiliser une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes. 
Vous devrez maîtriser la production d’une équipe de 1 à 5 personnes.

-Vous animez l’équipe de réalisation et veillez, avec le business manager, à la bonne dynamique humaine de celle-ci et en relation avec l’ensemble de l’équipe projet. 

-Vous répondez de la qualité technique des réalisations et en particulier aux enjeux liés à un site e-commerce en ligne.
Vous organisez en concertation avec le business manager une capacité d’intervention pour répondre aux contraintes et enjeux en matière de disponibilité d’un site e-commerce en ligne.

-Vous devrez être en mesure de traiter les urgences et les imprévus de « production » en s’appuyant sur l’ensemble des acteurs du projet concernés.

-Vous faites appel, autant que besoin, aux différents supports et expertises techniques nécessaires

-Vous contribuez, avec le Business Manager, à l’évaluation des collaborateurs impliqués sur les projets dont vous aurez la responsabilité pour le compte de la direction des ressources de compétences et notamment du responsable du pôle technique.
